title: Jessica Alba juggles five cups and a bag of food as the actress goes on a drinks run in Los Angeles
text:
She's a wife, mom-of-three, CEO and Hollywood actress.

And despite her star power, Jessica Alba proved she was still happy to go on the morning drinks run on Saturday.

The 38-year-old beauty was spotted in Los Angeles picking up various beverages and food for a team of people from Urth cafe.

Solo drinks run: Jessica Alba proved she wasn't above the morning drinks run on Saturday, when she was spotted out in Los Angeles at Urth cafe solo

Jessica Alba kept things casual in a dark graphic T-shirt and a matching pair of straight legged trousers.

The beauty added to her 5ft7 stature with a black sneakers that had a platform heel.

She kept her accessories simple to just a pair of shades that she used to keep a low profile.

Comfort first: Jessica Alba kept things casual in a dark graphic T-shirt and a matching pair of straight legged trousers

Jessica styled her brunette tresses out into its natural waves. She appeared to be makeup free for the errands run.

Not seen with the Honest CEO was her husband, Cash Warren, 40, or their three children.

The In the Blood producer and actress first began dating back in 2004 when they met on set of Fantastic Four.

They married in Los Angeles in May 2008, one month before their first child, daughter, Honor, 11, was born.

Family: Jessica is married to Cash Warren and they share kids, Honor, 11, Haven, eight, and Hayes, one

Doting mom: The mom-of-three told Motherly in August 2018 that since welcoming Hayes, she ensures to spend more one-on-one time with her girls so they don't feel like they're missing out

Jessica and Cash went on to welcome Haven, eight, in 2011, and son, Hayes, one, in 2017.

The mom-of-three told Motherly in August 2018 that since welcoming Hayes, she ensures to spend more one-on-one time with her girls so they don't feel like they're missing out.

'Since we've had him [Hayes] Cash and I have made it a point to spend more one on one time with the girls, so I'll take one and he'll take one for an afternoon and we'll do a little lunch or go on a hike or have a picnic,' she said.

'Basically our daughter, whichever one we have, they get to choose whatever they want and they have our undivided attention for that three hours. It's been really special bonding time.'

'We don't do it every weekend but we try to do it at least once a month. And that's been something the kids have really looked forward to and really liked.'
description: Jessica Alba proved she wasn't above of the morning drinks run on Saturday, when she was spotted out in Los Angeles at Urth cafe solo.
